net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth

Class RemoteUserRequestWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
        • net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth.RemoteUserRequestWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest

    public class RemoteUserRequestWrapper
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
    Provides the remote user information as determined by the authentication.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
